title: Central Government Pensioners Welfare Association Noida
detailsOfAchievement: Central Government Pensioners Welfare Association, Noida is working for the welfare of the retired central government officers and staff residing in Distt. Gautam Budh Nagar . In fact it is the only registered body of central government officers and staff in the whole NCR. Taking the activities of CGPWA into cognizance , CGPWA Noida has been nominated as a permanent member to the SCOVA by the Ministry of Personnel, P.G. and Pensions, Department of Pension and Pensioners Welfare New Delhi. CGPWA Noida is working with the motto, SERVICE TO PEOPLE IS SERVICE TO NATION. We are actively associated with the Ministry of Health to mitigate the hardships, if any, of the senior citizens and super senior citizens being faced by them in CGHS Welness Center. We also organise computer literacy programme for the retired persons to give them basic knowledge of computer. We are also closely associated with Digital India programme of our PM. As per directions and assistance provided by Department of Pension and Pensioners Welfare we worked hard to get the Pension Accounts of our Pensioners linked with their Aadhar Number for Aadhar based annual identification of the Pensioners from the local banks or CGPWA Noida Office. We are proud to say that Department of Pensions and pensioners welfare has made a commendable job for the welfare of the Pensioners as a whole and particularly members of CGPWA Noida of NCR.

detailsOfAchievement: Creation India Society, SA-15/138-B-1, Mawaiya, Sarnath, Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh is registered under Societies Registration Act 1860 on 31/12/2004. However our work was started in 2003 and from then to now we have successfully executed number of activities till date. Our registration number is 1187. The working area of the CIS is PAN India Currently we are performing our activities in the area of women, de addiction program and child welfare and the skill development domain. CIS has executed number of projects successfully across the Varanasi, Soanbhadra, and Samastipur Bihar State. We are the leader in child welfare and the women empowerment programs. Recently Creation India Society has started to strength the skills of the youth by associating the partner with Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship, Government of India. Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojna is the flagship program of our Prime Minister Sri Narendra Modi Ji and we are glad to become partner of this fleet. CIS has registered with Udyog Aadhar, Ministry of MSME (Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises) Government of India for executing the NSIC (National Small Industries Corporation). CIS has also registered with Department of Women and Child Development, UP and Ministry of Social Welfare, Directorate of Bihar. CIS is currently executing the following programs in various areas
